channel.title: Summer on A Vigilante's Pride
channel.description: Recent content in Summer on A Vigilante's Pride

item.title: Summer 2017
item.description:
So the summer is about to end, and a new session about to begin.
With new students coming in, you feel a bit older, a bit senior, a bit more responsible. During school days summer was a time to have fun, enjoy yourself, go out and have fun, while in college it becomes a time to work on your interests, to learn and develop new skills, and return back to college as a better person.

Here a few things I began during my summer break in the sequence :

(Task finished will be striked off)

  • Began the summer working on QSTP on image search using Deep learning taught by Sethu Iyer.

  • Learning some static website generator.

    • Hugo
    • Learn Markdown

  • Python programming

    • Basics
    • Programming foundations in python - Udacity

  • Python for Data Science

    • Jupyter notebooks
    • pandas
    • numpy
    • Scikit-learn
    • matplotlib
    • git
    • nltk

  • Machine Learning course by Andrew Ng *

Books I read :

Did finish all of them.

  • Adulthood Is a Myth (Sarah’s Scribbles #1)
  • When Breath Becomes Air by Paul Kalanithi
  • Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World by Cal Newport
  • The Prince by Niccol√≤ Machiavelli
  • Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone (Harry Potter #1) by JK Rowling

I am pretty happy with my performance in book reading.

That was my summer in a giffy. I plan to finish the remaining items before September 1, 2017. I also plan to write entire life goals, will update the link here.
Also I will keep on writing posts like these every 2 months.

signing off
Avp
